title: Design of Concrete Structures
description: Covers reinforced concrete design with ACI code examples.

title: Structural Analysis
description: Introduction to structural systems and load-bearing calculations.

title: Steel Structures: Design and Behavior
description: Focuses on structural steel and load analysis.

title: Reinforced Concrete Fundamentals
description: Deep dive into reinforcement techniques and durability.

title: Advanced Structural Analysis
description: Covers modern structural methods like FEM.

title: Principles of Geotechnical Engineering
description: Covers soil mechanics and foundation analysis.

title: Soil Mechanics and Foundations
description: Essential book for understanding geotechnical behavior.

title: Foundation Engineering Handbook
description: Advanced guide for foundation systems and types.

title: Geosynthetics in Civil Engineering
description: Use of synthetic materials in geotechnical structures.

title: Basic and Applied Soil Mechanics
description: Fundamentals and applications of soil testing.

title: Transportation Engineering: Khanna & Justo
description: Textbook standard for Indian roadways & highway design.

title: Traffic Engineering Handbook
description: Latest edition on traffic signal design and planning.

title: Highway Engineering
description: Fundamentals of road materials, drainage and design.

title: Urban Transport Planning
description: An overview of urban mobility and infrastructure planning.

title: Introduction to Transportation Systems
description: Broad look at transport policy, design and systems.

title: Surveying Vol 1
description: Covers leveling, theodolites, and measurement basics.

title: Surveying Vol 2
description: Advanced techniques in field and geodetic surveying.

title: Plane and Geodetic Surveying
description: Engineering-level principles for ground mapping.

title: Basics of Remote Sensing and GIS
description: Combining satellite data with surveying techniques.

title: Advanced Surveying
description: Study of photogrammetry and total station instruments.

title: Environmental Engineering Vol 1
description: Water supply, treatment and distribution systems.

title: Environmental Engineering Vol 2
description: Wastewater, sewage and air pollution management.

title: Water and Wastewater Engineering
description: Concepts and techniques of water resources control.

title: Solid Waste Engineering
description: Design of solid waste collection, transport and disposal systems.

title: Air Pollution Control Engineering
description: Emission control systems and air quality modeling.
